text: @MarioDB @realDonaldTrump @AmericanAir @iflymia Why has Trump opened his hotels for those affected by Coronavirus or allow healthcare workers to stay there? Trump is NOT #MAGA with his actions. He should freely allow them to stay there. Put his $ where im his mouth is.
